translations: n.临时房屋；帐篷；神龛；礼拜堂，会堂；圣所，会幕；桅座，夹桅板；圣体盒

sentences.sentence: 2but when the Jewish Feast of Tabernacles was near.
sentences.translation: 当时，犹太人的住棚节近了。

sentences.sentence: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.
sentences.translation: 我们要进他的居所，在他脚凳前下拜。

sentences.sentence: And smote all the firstborn in Egypt; the chief of their strength in the tabernacles of ham.
sentences.translation: 在埃及击杀一切长子，在含的帐棚中，击杀他们强壮时头生的。
